content: I'm having a bit of a problem with clutter on my desk. I've been trying to set aside 10 minutes each day to tidy it up, but it's not really working out. By the way, speaking of tidying, I've been doing a 10-minute tidy of the living room every morning before work since last Monday, and it's made a huge difference. Do you have any suggestions for a better system to keep track of my papers and notes?
